CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Testing and Validation stage positioned above or below the Design Phase stage?
SRP.A: The Testing and Validation stage is positioned {below} the Design Phase stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {logarithmic} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Design Phase?
VE.A: The value of stage Design Phase is {56%}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Final Design Approval?
VE.A: The value of stage Final Design Approval is {15%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Project Initiation, with a value of {100%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Final Design Approval, with a value of {15%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Testing and Validation to stage Final Design Approval?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Testing and Validation to stage Final Design Approval is {3%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Design Phase to stage Prototype Development?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Design Phase to stage Prototype Development is {25%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 24%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Project Initiation} stage has {100%}, the {Design Phase} stage has {56%}, the {Prototype Development} stage has {31%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 43%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Prototype Development} stage has {31%}, the {Testing and Validation} stage has {18%}, the {Final Design Approval} stage has {15%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 16% and 78%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Design Phase} stage has {56%}, the {Prototype Development} stage has {31%}, the {Testing and Validation} stage has {18%}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Testing and Validation to Final Design Approval, or from stage Project Initiation to Design Phase?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Project Initiation} to {Design Phase} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Project Initiation to Design Phase, from stage Design Phase to Prototype Development, or from stage Prototype Development to Testing and Validation?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Project Initiation} to stage {Design Phase} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Project Initiation} and {Design Phase} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Testing and Validation} and {Final Design Approval} stages.
